definitions.body: city in Dan Jos 19:42, Jos 21:24 (Levit. city) Ju Jdg 1:35, 1Sa 14:31 doubtless same; so 1Ch 6:54 (where Dan om.); app. later in Benj. 1Ch 8:13, 2Ch 11:10, 2Ch 28:18 (v. Be); [[עֵמֶק אַיׇּלוֹן]] Jos 10:12 almost certainly named from same; = Epiph. )Ialw mod. Jâlo Rob:BR ii. 253, Survey:iii. 19.
